Install packages
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(rprojroot)
library(naniar)
```


## Import raw data

```{r}
project_path <- find_rstudio_root_file()
rawdata_path <- paste0(project_path, "/raw_data/")
rawdata <- read.csv(paste0(rawdata_path,"sars_2003_complete_dataset_clean.csv"))
```


## Clean data a bit 

```{r}

cleandata <- rawdata %>%

     # dates
     mutate(Date = as.Date(Date)) %>%
          
     # clean up country names
     mutate(Country = case_when(Country == "Canada" ~ "Canadian",
                                Country == "Hong Kong SAR, China" ~ "Hong Kong",
                                Country == "Macao SAR, China" ~ "Macao",
                                Country == "Republic of Ireland" ~ "Ireland",
                                Country == "Russian Federation" ~ "Russia",
                                Country == "Taiwan, China" ~ "Taiwan",
                                Country == "United Kingdom" ~ "UK",
                                Country == "United States" ~ "USA",
                                Country == "Republic of Korea" ~ "Korea",
                                .default = Country)) %>%
     
     # clean up variable names
     rename(Recovered = Number.recovered, 
            Cases = Cumulative.number.of.case.s.,
            Deaths = Number.of.deaths) %>%
     
     # drop rogue observation (two obs on same day, one of which is odd)
     filter(!(Country == "China" & Date == "2003-04-12" & Cases == 62))

```



## Evaluate missingness

```{r}

# create a data frame that has ALL dates within the date range of the raw data
dates <- seq.Date(from = as.Date(min(cleandata$Date)), 
                  to = as.Date(max(cleandata$Date)),1)
dates_df <- as.data.frame(dates, col.names = c("Date"))
names(dates_df) <- "Date"
dates_df$Country <- "Dummy"

# append this dates df to our raw data
df1 <- bind_rows(cleandata, dates_df)

# reshape to wide and check out missingness
df1_cases <- df1[c("Date","Country","Cases")]
df1_wide <- spread(df1_cases, key = Country, value = Cases)
df1_wide$Date <- NULL
df1_wide$Dummy <- NULL
vis_miss(df1_wide)
```
